newsitem.title: GERMANY: BHW PLANS NEWS CONFERENCE ON DSL.
newsitem.headline: BHW PLANS NEWS CONFERENCE ON DSL.

text.p: German financial services group BHW AG is to hold a news conference on Tuesday to address its sale of a stake in DSL Bank as well as other topics, a BHW spokesman said on Monday.
The standard invitiation to the conference says BHW chief executive Reinhard Wagner will give information on the company's outlook and strategy.
BHW said last week it had reduced its stake in DSL to around 10.5 percent from 20.7 percent.
The company denied selling the DSL stake to Postbank, the postal bank due for privatisation next year, but gave no further details of the transaction.
On Monday, Commerzbank AG declined comment on market talk that it had bought the DSL stake and was negotiating to buy a further package.
DSL is 52 percent in state control.
